Articles.Content:
Bump.

Since school is starting on August 25th, development may be slowed.

So I was testing a new moon. I clicked on it and activated ScaledSpace.

Suddenly, the Kerbol system vanished.

Sorry for not replying for long, I couldn't play KSP for two days (problems with computer). But very soon I'll upload some screenshots of my new mission! Thanks you for making Verviedi rotating so fast, it makes my return mission twice easier. (Getting to equatorial orbit will not be so hard as, for example, from Laythe). And I promise, I'll return Jebediah home...

P.S. Did you finally accept my idea of changing "Ceti_map" to blue one? I still dont understand, why not? It looks more... oceanic and more attractive, trust me!

Sorry for not replying for long, I couldn't play KSP for two days (problems with computer). But very soon I'll upload some screenshots of my new mission! Thanks you for making Verviedi rotating so fast, it makes my return mission twice easier. (Getting to equatorial orbit will not be so hard as, for example, from Laythe). And I promise, I'll return Jebediah home...

P.S. Did you finally accept my idea of changing "Ceti_map" to blue one? I still dont understand, why not? It looks more... oceanic and more attractive, trust me!

I did that. Next update!

V2.5 (The Kerbol Update) is looking like it'll be the largest update ever, in the history of both KU and KU2.

Content So Far- (may be changed)

Folion- A very small (for a gas giant) gas giant with an oxygen atmosphere.

Rime- An oceanic, Kerbinlike moon for Folion.

Hephus-A pale, smooth moon of Folion.

Monope-A blue, rocky moon of Folion. Very cratery.

Cleathea-A bright turquiose gas giant.

Ostarth-The only moon of Cleathea. Contains highly pressurized gas that often explodes when exposed to high temperatures.

Kydros-The furthest planet from Kerbol.

Changes

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Fixed WTBs

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Eeloo is now merely a dwarf planet, like Dres. (Kydros is the NEW Eeloo)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added PTTGRW to the Verion easter egg.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added new Agency and Flag. The Interplanetary Exploration Collective. Serves as a provider of contracts to the new planets.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Added new Agency and Flag, Verviedi Stardrive. Serves as a more business-minded version of the IEC.

Edited August 20, 2014 by Poryy

I suppose a lack of replies is a good thing, because that means I haven't broken anything.

I still don't like being on the 4th page. BOMP.

News-

I have fixed the "Kerbol System Vanishing" bug, and am now merely crashing on load due to memory limit.

At least the new planets work!

EDIT-

We have hit the 5,000 download milestone. I should do something special.

Please suggest things to do for 5,000 download forum party. The mod stays on page 1, and interesting stuff happens! It's a win-win!

Edited August 21, 2014 by Poryy
Can you put an alien derelict craft on one of your planets?

Can you put an alien derelict craft on one of your planets?

Is Kerbtown updated?

For now I am in the middle of my return mission to Verviedi, and (good news) I have some screenshots to share. My ship is called The Vessel (I didn't try to be original). I used KW rocketry parts (not cheating!). It is made of two stages that are launched separately. The main pilot is (The original and the Best) Jebediah Kerman:D.

Screenshots:

The Vessel is docked in orbit of Kerbin:

During the main burn:

Approaching at Verviedi:

Two moons of Verviedi(Visiting one in the next mission):

The ETO-1 (Easy-to-orbit) lander enters Verviedi's atmosphere:

Verviedi as Jeb sees it:

Epic win! Safe landing!

One small step... (DOUBLE Epic win!):

The actual return will happen tomorrow (Jeb is staying at Verviedi for a while - Science!)

P.S. Really waiting wor the next update! New places for Jeb to go! I saw, you are making another oceanic moon - don't make'em all same - make them at least different colour (blue can be different)...

My god. How much dV did that take?

You win Kerbal Universe 2. Did you bring probes on that ship to land on Phobius and Diamas? I am eagerly awaiting moar adventures. I think Verion, Folion, and Cleathea would be too easy for you!

You know what? When V2.5 comes out, I challenge you to land on Kydros and return. Preferably Kerballed, but a probe will suffice.

Challenge accepted. But I'll have to think on ship design for a while... (this one took three days:confused:). And I still don't know, will jeb safely return (he's still at Verviedi, but I'lll have multilple tries). Perhaps, I'l use same drive section, but a different lander... You know, it takes not so much deltaV to return from your star systems, cos onse you escape, it takes a tiny bit of DeltaV to encounter Kerbin (the orbital speed around Kerbol is low there). So, if I safely dock the ETO-1 capsule (I won't carry the rest of it, it is not an SSTO), it will mean Jeb is already home. The screenshots will be here once I return Jeb. And, no, there were no probes for moons in this mission.

P.S. What are characteristics of Kydros? Where will it be? i still have problems loading something except of the Abaddon system, so i like it the most. Waiting for update with new different (that's important) oceanic moons. And the new rocky ones, too.

Challenge accepted. But I'll have to think on ship design for a while... (this one took three days:confused:). And I still don't know, will jeb safely return (he's still at Verviedi, but I'lll have multilple tries). Perhaps, I'l use same drive section, but a different lander... So, if I safely dock the ETO-1 capsule (I won't carry the rest of it, it is not an SSTO), it will mean Jeb is already home. The screenshots will be here once I return Jeb. Kydros will be the furthest planet from Kerbol. It is about twice as far from Kerbol as Eeloo, has an inclined orbit, has no atmosphere, and low gravity.

Today, as planned, Jebediah Kerman have returned home. His mission took at least 300 years, but he is home and waiting for new adventures!

Here are the screenshots:

Liftoff!

The moon in the sky:

The last look:

Onwards!

Encounter at farpoint:

The Vessel leaves Verviedi:

Let's go not really interstellar, but binary...

The glorious Vessel (what's left of it):

Home, sweet home!

Flames of reentry (about 7000 m/s):

We are home!

Jeb is ready for new adventures!

P.S. Going to the small planet with lov gravity (no matter how far is it) is not as hard as this mission, but I will send Jeb there once 2.5 is out! I am waitinng! Thanks for making this great mod, which gave me a new challenge in KSP!

V2.5 is out. I just have to wait for the sllllooooowwww Curse mods to review it.

You could use Kerbal Stuff instead. Nice mod, by the way.

You could use Kerbal Stuff instead. Nice mod, by the way.

What's Kerbal Stuff?
Bumptenchar.
Are the cloud textures already in the mod, or do I have to download them from somewhere?
And also, when I use the Kerbol Expansion, most of the moons have the default texture.
But other than that, this seems to be working, except Pershimu- http://imgur.com/Qy2kAYy

(Suggestion) I really like this mod and I like to visit different places in it, so I want to take a small part in its development. I've recently done a nice map for the new oxygen-atmosphere moon of Cleathe (It needs one). If you don't like the idea of adding moons to this planet, you can add it as separate planet for the existing star systems... There's map and heightmap inside, use the map as colourmap too, and the normal map can be flat (If you need it, I can make one). Here's the archive: https://yadi.sk/d/8pTEF1nSaKStK

P.S. My mission to Kydros is starting today. I will not upload this much screenshots, but the important moments will be uploaded!

And also, when I use the Kerbol Expansion, most of the moons have the default texture.

Anyone know how this can be fixed?

Anyone know how this can be fixed?

It's a memory bug. It means you need to turn texture quality down, and unistall some mods.

Okay, thanks.

- - - Updated - - -

Oh, and cool mod by the way. Nice work.

- - - Updated - - -

But I still cannot seem to get the Kerbol expansion working.
